channel.title: (pi) My barrows Dc when i kill a brother. [Easy to solve] please check
channel.description:
Ok my brothers are outside there graves on there own montaine anyways i killed some and evrytime id kill one it would Dc me. i found this code in my Confing.java this is why i said it was easy to solve. /** * Barrows Reward */
/** * Glory */ ĤERE there is some stuff but not in the barrows reward section...
